title: Deep learning with ML.NET: Image Classification | ML.NET [8 of 8]
excerpt: Deep learning enables many more scenarios using sound, images, text and other data types. Learn how to build an Image Classification model to classify flowers (daisies, roses etc.).  Follow Pranav Rastogi: https://twitter.com/rustd  Watch the entire series here: https://aka.ms/dotnet3-mlnet Download
